rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about certain decisions by the DVLA, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The requirements for changing the body type of a vehicle to a motor caravan are set out by the DVLA here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/converting-a-vehicle-into-a-motor-caravan/converting-a-vehicle-into-a-motor-caravan

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to review the requirements for changing the body type of a vehicle to a motor caravan, but it would need to be clear what requirements you wanted to be reviewed, and your petition couldn't seek to prejudge the outcome of any review.
